Title: Baby Massage
Description: Suitable from birth until pre-walking. Helps with bonding, wind, colic, reflux and more. Includes a bottle of massage oil and handouts with details of massage strokes. Includes songs, rhymes and a little sensory play.
Location: Tyldesley Pelican Centre, Castle Street, Tyldesley, Manchester, M29 8EG, 07841866860

Title: Jubilee Park
Description: Jubilee Park on the way to Ashton is one of the most beautiful and well kept small parks in the borough. Facilities include a pavilion and toilets, tennis and basket ball courts, grass pitches play areas, woodland area and a formal flower park.

Title: Let's talk with your baby

Location: Charles Street, Ince, Wigan, WN2 2AL, 01942 767503 ext2.

Description: Sessions consists of fun activities to promote language & communication.  Sessions are run for 8 weeks.  Booking is required
